contributors.confirm_remove_affiliation_text: Are you sure you want to remove this affiliation?
contributors.confirm_remove_author_text: Are you sure you want to remove {{contributorName}}?
contributors.create_new_author_description:
Personregisteret inneholder personer med opphavsrett til publiserte vitenskapelige arbeid som er tilgjengelig i institusjonens bibliotek, vitenarkiv eller er del av Norsk Vitenskapsindeks. Også omtalte personer kan bli registrert.

Om personen du søker har publisert noe vitenskapelig tidligere, eller har nylig fullført en vitenskapelig grad ved en norsk utdanningsinstitusjon, så er det sannsynlig at personen alt er registrert.

En kurator vil prøve å finne ut om dette er en ny person eller om det er en ny skrivemåte på en tidligere registrert person.

public_page.error_description: To publish you must fix the following errors:
public_page.find_in_channel_registry: Find in the Norwegian register for publishers
public_page.preview_unavailable: Preview not available. Open file in suited program.
public_page.request_doi_description: When you request a DOI (Digital Object Identifier), the order will go through a curator at your institution for quality control. Add a message in case of any questions or clarifications. You will receive an email when the request has been evaluated.

resource_type.nvi_fail_no_peer_review: This publication can not be incuded in the Norwegian Science Index, since it's not peer reviewed.
resource_type.nvi_fail_not_rated:
This publication can not be included in the Norwegian Science Index (NSI), since selected publication channel is not at level 1 or 2. 

(The publication channel's level may be changed, so the publication can be included in NSI)
resource_type.nvi_success: This publication can be included in the Norwegian Science Index
resource_type.peer_review: Is peer reviewed and presents new original research?
resource_type.peer_reviewed: Peer reviewed and presents new original research
resource_type.remove_doi_text:
You can remove the DOI that was used when starting registration.
Do you wish to remove connection to the original DOI?

support_description: When you request support your message will be sent to a curator at your institution. You can see responses at <0>My Messages</0>.
